data.title: Lots of information about the municipality city Hattingen (update 2022!)
data.meta_description: View the information on over 100 topics about the municipality city Hattingen!  With charts, links to more information & an overview of all figures in 1 table.
data.text:
Population numbers per year

The number of inhabitants in the municipality city Hattingen

One moment please, your device is loading the charts...

Population numbers in the municipality city Hattingen for the years 2009 thru 2019.

The number of inhabitants is the number of persons as registered in the population register on January 1st.

Population at the map of Hattingen

Map of District Ennepe-Ruhr-Kreis with the population per municipality.Municipality Hattingen is highlighted with a red edge. The numbers at the map represent the following municipalities: 1: municipality city Witten, 2: municipality city Herdecke, 3: municipality city Wetter (Ruhr), 4: municipality city Hattingen, 5: municipality city SprockhÃ¶vel, 6: municipality city Gevelsberg, 7: municipality city Schwelm, 8: municipality city Ennepetal, 9: municipality city Breckerfeld.

The number of rooms per house (dwelling)

The number of rooms of the houses in the municipality city Hattingen

One moment please, your device is loading the charts...

Municipality city Hattingen, 2019, number of rooms per house.

The percentage shows the relative share of houses per category based on the numer of rooms: 1 to 2 rooms, 3 to 4 rooms or 5 rooms or more. This is based on the total number of rooms as identified for all dwellings in the municipality city Hattingen.
